QuestData.Title: Boar Training: Bulbapore
QuestData.Description: Way down south in the Spires of Arak, the land's being overtaken by the mushrooms that grow underwater. The result? Strange fungal creatures sprouting up all over the place.$B$BTaking on a strange creature, like the fungal giant Bulbapore, gives us a great chance to expose your boar to predators it's unfamiliar with.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Bulbapore while riding your Boar-In-Training.
